body.name: LED Under Cabinet Lighting Wireless, 70 LED+350LM Lights for Under Cabinets in Kitchen, 2 PACK 1800mAh Rechargeable Under Cabinet Lighting, Dimmable Magnetic Under Cabinet Lights Wireless Led Lights
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 57 mins
features: 👍【UPGRADE 15.75 Inch & 70 LEDS UNDER CABINET LIGHTS】Illuminate your space with COOLNIGHT upgraded under cabinet lighting wireless. ①Our under cabinet lighting wireless is designed with 70 LEDs, delivering up to 350 lumens of brightness, brighter and soft. ②Using precise PIR sensors, wireless led lights keep the family safe! ③Dimmable is our exclusive features.④It hold a charge long with a 1800mAh rechargeable battery. ⑤Super easy to install without any tools.Perfect for ur home lighting.

👍【SMART PRECISE PIR SENSOR】Using a precise PIR sensor, rechargeable under cabinet lighting wireless provide bright light by sensing motion and light. In AUTO sensor mode, once detecting your approaching(Range: 13ft, Angle: 120°),the rechargeable under cabinet lighting wireless AUTO turns ON & OFF when u walks near/away,making it convenient to use under low light conditions.With this wireless led lights,u save energy.With under cabinet lights,u keep the family safe!How smart & energy-saving!

👍【SUPER BRIGHT & SOFT & DIMMABLE: 70 LEDs, 350lm】Our rechargeable under cabinet lighting wireless with 70 LEDs, up 350lm. The wireless led lights emits light on the side, so the light is brighter but not glare. The rechargeable under cabinet lighting wireless offter u a gentle 6500K White light, bright enough to make sure u never stumble in the dark. Ur various needs are met by this dimmable wireless led lights. Under cabinet lighting wireless shines gentle lights even to old people & babies!

👍【1800MAH LARGER CAPACITY RUN 90 DAYS】The under cabinet lighting wireless has built-in 1800mAH battery. Unlike other under cabinet lighting wireless, with this magnetic under cabinet lights,u don't need to keep buying AAA batteries and no need charged constantly,how u can save trouble&money!Once charged,rechargeable under cabinet lighting can last as long as 90 days under MOTION SENSOR MODE!After being charged,u can use under cabinet lighting WIRELESS,even as a flashlight in case of powercut!

👍【0-3 SEC TO INSTALL: MAGNETIC & STICK-TO-ANYWHERE】The under cabinet lights wireless comes with a built-in magnet & a user-friendly 3M strip. ①U can stick the magnetic under cabinet lights to any metal surface in 0 SEC! ②Or rip off the 3M adhere strip to any non-mental surface!When need charge or change place,u can take it off directly without any tools.How easy to install!With magnetic under cabinet lights,just stick to cabinets,kitchen or anywhere!No need to drill!Just 0-3 SEC IS ENOUGH!

👍【ULTRA-THIN & SILVER ALUMINUM MATERIAL】The LED under cabinet lighting wireless boasts of its high-end aluminum material & good look. The under cabinet lighting wireless also creats luxury & taste. The wireless led lights is only 0.35 inch thin. Wherever u stick on this magnetic under cabinet lights,it adds grace.Its compact size makes it so versatile that it can be fitted easily into closets,vanity cabinets,etc.!It's a silver&good-looking uunder cabinet lighting WIRELESS for ur elegant home!

💌【3-YEAR SERVICE SUPPORTING】COOLNIGHT Led under cabinet lighting wireless comes with a 3 years quality promise. No hesitation to contact us if u r meet with problems of rechargeable under cabinet lighting wireless, lights for under cabinets in kitchen. We spare no efforts to provide rechargeable under cabinet lighting wireless for U.COOLNIGHT strives to make the best led under cabinet lighting wireless on earth.Just take a wireless led lights home,COOLNIGHT provides u strong quality promise.

👍【3 LIGHTING MODES: AUTO ON, ALWAYS ON, OFF】The rechargeable under cabinet lighting can be set to be Motion Auto ON, Always-ON, or OFF. In Auto- ON, effortlessly navigate through your environment as our under cabinet lights wireless detect every move within a 10-foot range in dark, graciously illuminating ur path. In Always-ON, u use the wireless led lights & rechargeable under cabinet lighting wireless on daytime for a long time task,which can be used in reading,camping and as a flashlight.

👍【UPGRADED DIMMING CLOSET LIGHTS】Our under cabinet led lights is bright and eye-protection,thanks to 70 energy-saving LEDs and a glare-free frosted cover.In addition,unlike fixed brightness of others',our wireless led lights has dimming of brightness.So dimmable magnetic under cabinet lights wireless,lights for under cabinets in kitchen allows u to brighten them for task like meal preparation and dim them for a magnetic under cabinet lights wireless without waking other people up at midnight

💌【3-YEAR SERVICE SUPPORTING】COOLNIGHT led under cabinet lights wireless comes with a 3 years quality promise.No hesitation to contact us if u r meet with problems of under cabinet led lights,under cabinet lights wireless.We spare no efforts to provide rechargeable under cabinet lighting wireless led strip lights for U.COOLNIGHT strives to make the best under cabinet motion sensor lighting on earth.Just take a led under cabinet lights wireless home,COOLNIGHT provides u strong quality promise.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded Under Cabinet Lights Wireless: 70 LEDs, 350 Lumens, 1800mAh Battery, Precise PIR Sensors, Dimming

SUPER BRIGHT & SOFT & DIMMABLE: 70 LEDs, 350 Lumens, Being Brighter but not Dazzling ✔ 70 LED: The under cabinet lighting includes 70 LED beads which emit 350 lumens of soft, diffused white light. ✔ Provide sufficient light to illuminate every dark corner！

Using a precise PIR sensor, under cabinet lights wireless provide bright light by sensing motion and light. Motion & Light Sensor Mode: The closet lights motion sensored will auto-on when human motion is detected within 120°and 10ft, and auto-off after about 15-20 seconds of no motion detected.
Always On Mode: Hold a long charge for 3.5-40 hours. Motion Sensor Mode: If the light work 3 times a day, the under cabinet lights wireless can hold a long charge for 60-90 days.

0-3 SEC SUPER EASY TO INSTALL: Just Stick It! ✔ Way1: You can stick the closet lights to any metal surface in 0 SEC! ✔ Way2: Rip off the 3M adhere strip to any non-mental surface! When need charge or change place, u can take it off directly without any tools.

Suitable for Every Corner of Your Home! 0-100% Adjustable Brightness for Your Different Needs ✔ Adjustable Brightness: Long press button to stepless dimming, meet different lighting needs. ✔ The under cabinet lights wireless is ideal for use in cabinet, kitchen, closet, pantry, laundry, wardrobe, cupboard, toilet, corridors, hallway, stairs and baby room among other places.

MOTION SENSORED AT NIGHT: Smarter & Safer! SUPER BRIGHT & SOFT & DIMMABLE: 70 LEDs, 350 Lumens, Being Brighter but not Dazzling No hesitation to tell me if you are met with problems of COOLNIGHT UNDER CABINET LIGHTS WIRELESS.Just take a led under cabinet lighting wireless home, COOLNIGHT BRAND provides you strong quality promise & 3 years of after-sales service‎‎.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love These Lights
reviews.reviewText: The lights are easy to install and easy to recharge. They provide great light where needed for a small space. I use them for under kitchen counter lighting and the motion detection component is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better adhesive holder needed
reviews.reviewText: In general very good, slow sensor and fair holder (could be stronger).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Under cabinet lights
reviews.reviewText: Love these lights. They are motion sensored and rechargeable. They have built in magnats so they stick right to my metal cabinet. Great product great price and great seller

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are rechargeable! No batteries
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift! She loved the lights! She loved that they are motion lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Short lasting charge
reviews.reviewText: These don't even last 1 night under our cabinets. We need to recharge twice a day even when using the motion detection. Now they were very inexpensive so I'm not making a big deal here but I'm sick of buying items don't perform as described. The motion detection is also not consistent. They are bright and fit nicely under a cabinet. I'm going to try a different brand and if it's the same thing I'll just go with the plug in version. I usually get decent quality items even when I buy on the low end of price. This is not the case here.

reviews.reviewerName: Sandy and Lenny AdamsSandy and Lenny Adams
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our Ikea closets were just too dark and this works perfectly! I do wish it was just a bit more sensitive to the motion detection, but all I need to do is wave my hand. Maybe I should have installed it closer to the entrance. Either way, affordable and easy way to light up the closet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting battery and good light output
reviews.reviewText: These lamps are very clean and simple looking, which I appreciate. They are also very thin and compact. If I weren't planning on using the motion sensors, I'd be unhappy with the switch set up—multiple presses to go from on, to sensor, to off—but since I am using the sensor, its a moot point. The second button controls brightness, alternating from ramping down and ramping up with each press. I took a fine sharpie marker and drew in the recesses of the on off buttons, since it was hard to see which was which where I have the placed.These come charged, but I emptied them (not knowing how fully charged they were) and recharged them completely. Leaving them on, they were still at about 80% of maximum brightness after 6 hours, and I got another two hours until I felt they were at a point where they really needed recharging. So—for my use as in closet light, these should not require constant charging. Of course, I don't know how much of a battery drain the motion detector and switching circuitry are, so I expect that in use, I won't get 6 or 8 hours of usable illumination out of them. On the other hand, given how short closest visits usually are, I'm expecting at least a month between charges, which is fine.The light is close to around 6000 Kelvin, "daylight" which tends to be the brightest—I haven't checked closely for color retention, but it seems to be reasonably accurate. While these emit light at close to 180º they are strongest over about 120º arc and I've decided to make a bracket that holds them slightly angled downwards (they are being mounted in a closet above the door) to make best use of the light. I will be using them on at full brightness, but the dimming does work fine.If these fail to last as long as they should, I will update this review.
